sqlMap.select: SELECT class_name name FROM DB_CLASS WHERE is_system_class = 'NO' AND class_type = 'CLASS' ORDER BY class_name
SELECT class_name name FROM DB_CLASS WHERE is_system_class = 'NO' AND class_type = 'CLASS' ORDER BY class_name
SELECT class_name name FROM DB_CLASS WHERE is_system_class = 'NO' AND class_type = 'CLASS' AND class_name = #name# ORDER BY class_name

select a.attr_name as "field" ,a.data_type as "type" , a.is_nullable as "null" , a.default_value as "default" , a.attr_type as "extra" , (case when k.key_order >= 0 then 'PK' else '' end) as "key" , k.key_order , k.asc_desc from db_attribute a left join db_index x on a.class_name = x.class_name and x.is_primary_key = 'YES' left join db_index_key k on x.index_name = k.index_name and x.class_name = k.class_name and a.attr_name = k.key_attr_name where a.class_name = #table# order by a.def_order
SELECT class_name FROM DB_CLASS WHERE is_system_class = 'NO' AND class_type = 'VCLASS' ORDER BY class_name

SELECT a.class_name AS table_name ,a.index_name ,CASE WHEN a.is_primary_key = 'YES' THEN 'PK' WHEN a.is_foreign_key = 'YES' THEN 'FK' WHEN a.is_unique = 'YES' then 'UQ' ELSE ' ' END as index_type FROM db_index a WHERE a.class_name = #table_name# ORDER BY table_name

SELECT a.class_name AS table_name, a.index_name, b.key_attr_name AS column_name, b.key_order AS column_position, b.key_order AS seq_in_index, b.key_prefix_length AS column_length FROM db_index a left join db_index_key b on a.index_name = b.index_name WHERE 1=1 AND a.index_name = #index_name# AND a.class_name = #table_name# ORDER BY column_position desc;
SELECT p.sp_name as "name" , p.* FROM db_stored_procedure p WHERE sp_type = 'PROCEDURE'
SELECT p.sp_name as "name" , p.* FROM db_stored_procedure p WHERE sp_type = 'FUNCTION'
SELECT name, event, condition AS statement FROM db_trigger
SELECT name, event, condition AS statement FROM db_trigger WHERE table = #table_name#
SELECT class_name name FROM DB_CLASS WHERE is_system_class = 'NO' AND class_type = 'CLASS' ORDER BY class_name

SELECT tab.class_name as table_name ,tab.partitioned as partitioned , col.attr_name as column_name , col.data_type as data_type , col.prec as data_precision , col.scale as data_scale , col.default_value as data_default , col.is_nullable as nullable FROM db_class tab inner join db_attribute col on tab.class_name = col.class_name where tab.is_system_class = 'NO' AND tab.class_type = 'CLASS' order by tab.class_name, col.def_order
